name: Ramona Galarza
description: '''Ramona Modesta Onetto Galarza''' (15 June 1940 – 22 September 2020), most often known as '''Ramona Galarza''', was an Argentine folk singer. She was a popular singer of [[chamamé]] and recorded over 30 albums during her career. Born in [[Corrientes]], she later moved to Buenos Aires and became known as '''''La Novia del Paraná'''''. She also appeared in a number of films and was honored by the [[Argentine Senate]].
